title: Rogue State
description: When all else fails. When people think their world is ending.When they have no choice but to ask for help.They call for me, I am the last line of defense.My name is Olivia. I am the Alpha to a mostly female pack. We get called on jobs all over the world, dealing with rogues. This job is a little too close to home.My mates are former military men that donâ€™t want to fight any more. They just want to live in peace with others like them. They show up in my woods needing my help.Now my mates and my pack are on the line. Nothing will stop me from doing what needs to be done.Rogues, you better watch out because they are under my protection. I refuse to fail.
author: Courtney  West
